title: how do i get the dmv to sit on my road s navassa rd in leland early in the mornings to stop the large trucks from rattleing my house as they drive by at 60  in a 45 mph zone we talking tanker trucks loaded with fuel  and large trucks going to navassa yard .who do i talk to to get help to slow them down?
text:
If your home is in Navassa town limits, you should contact the
Navassa Police Department. If your home is outside the town limits and
in Brunswick County, you should contact the sheriff's office and/or
the N.C. Highway Patrol.
